title: Katie Waissel shows off her incredible weight loss in before-and-after snaps
text:
She welcomed her first child eleven months ago.

And Katie Waissel showed off her incredible weight loss in before and after shots following an intense 10-month fitness overhaul.

In a lengthy Instagram post that she shared on Saturday, the X Factor star, 33, told fans that her transformation was a result of training three to four times a week and eating clean.

Impressive: Katie Waissel showed off her incredible weight loss in before-and-after snaps as she gushed that it 'feels so good to be me again' in an Instagram post she shared on Saturday

Katie shared photos from both the front and behind, showing off her toned abs and chiselled frame a grey bra and thongs.

She explained: 'It Feels So Good To Be Me Again - In the wake of everything that’s happening emotionally today, I thought I would share the positives in just how hard I have worked to re-find myself; not only emotionally but physically too!

'After qualifying for my UK personal training certification, and specialization in pre and post natal, it helped immensely to have the understanding of my body’s limitations after giving birth, and how to carefully navigate the wonderful ailments that came along with the beauty that is post partum.

'As a single mother, raising Hudson alone, and busting my ass trying to find my way since my move back to London, I honestly thought that this transformation would be impossible!

Making a change: In a lengthy post, the X Factor star, 33, told fans that her transformation was a result of training three to four times a week and eating clean

'But what I would like you guys to take from this, is that there is always time, everyone starts at the beginning, it’s ok to give up sometimes as long as you find your way back, and that a lifestyle change doesn’t happen over night, it’s a forever thing that takes accountability and commitment.

'As Hudson grows heavier, the stronger I need to be and that is the beauty of #functionalfitness!

'New beginnings don’t just have to start on a Monday, or on the 1st of a month or a year. Every day is a new day for a new start! Happy Saturday! Find your strength!'

The reality star split from boyfriend Andy Speer in September 2018, less than two months after the birth of their son.

Katie, who has since moved from New York to London to be near her family, spoke to Closer magazine about life as a single mum, admitting she 'doesn't know how she did it'.

She explained: 'Looking back, I don't know how I did it, I was adjusting to life as a mum and all the changes that brings, as well as dealing with a relationship breakdown and being miles away from my family.

'I always joke and call myself Superwoman but sometimes I feel it.'

Katie - who went through two divorces in four years before having a child with Andy, went on to admit that despite her chequered dating history, she hasn't been put off love.

Candid: Katie told fans that she 'thought the transformation would be impossible' after becoming a single mother to her son Hudson

The singer confessed that she relates to Ariana Grande's hit, Thank U, Next, about learning from past relationships and is ready to find love again.

She explained: 'Obviously Hudson is my main priority, and it would need to be someone absolutely amazing to grab my attention, but I'm not closed off to the idea.

'I'd love to give Hudson a family and siblings one day.'

Katie has had a troubled romance history. She divorced her first husband, model Brad Alphonso in 2012, following domestic violence claims.

She then divorced radio host Brian Moote in 2016 after a year of marriage and accused him of sleeping with the neighbour.
